beantype.name: org.rapidbeans.clubadmin.domain.Salary
beantype.description: Defines a named amount of money per time * associated with a certain role and optionally associated * with one or more trainer attributes. * Example 1: "BCI Trainer Normal" {without cerificate}: 7.25 euro / 45 min" * Example 2: "BCI Trainer Leader" {with leader cerificate}: 10 euro / 45 min" * german: Stundensatz.
